name: Electro Hypostasis
storytext:
Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.
Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.
source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Electro Hypostasis

skills.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and then separately performs "$[K53]" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24015]</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S24016]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> and then separately performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG and then separately performs "Prepare Skill" for Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors and Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper.

skills.name: Lightning Lockdown
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chains of Warding Thunder</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG, summons Chains of Warding Thunder.

skills.name: Electro Crystal Core
skills.descriptionraw: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124014]</color>.
skills.descriptionreplaced: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystal Core</color>.
skills.description: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains an Electro Crystal Core.

skills.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Scissors
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>, then performs "<color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>" for <color=#FFFFFFFF>Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper</color>.
skills.description: Deals 2 Electro DMG, then performs "Prepare Skill" for Rock-Paper-Scissors Combo: Paper.
